issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
1.publish KS (https://github.com/appcelerator-developer-relations/KitchenSink) using the noted config
2.install onto an iphone running ios6
3.nav to BaseUI > Window (standalone)
4.tap either of the buttons on the tool bar ("open tab animation" or "open tab w/o animation") and watch the tool bar itself during the animation. Compare to ios5.

results:on ios5, the tool bar animates down and off the screen during the transition. On ios6 the bar slides off the side.
fields.summary: iOS6 only - tool bar bar no longer animates the same way as ios5 does when opening a new window
fields.environment:
iphone4s (ios6) and iphone5 (ios6). An iphone4s running ios5 does not show this behavior. The behavior seems to be caused by software, not hardware.

Auth: sdk:Sep 21 2012 14:16 r1c7ff05b, studio 2.1.2GA, 10.8.

comments.body: This is behavioral change introduced by apple in iOS 6, marking to be on hold for now. Will investigate this further after 2.1.3 Release.
Closing ticket due to time passed.
